desc: Grocery and home delivery packages kept refrigerated and secure in a metal box on your porch like the milk box of past eras, but now with a weather resistant resettable combination lock, temperature zones to protect cold foods, and fast, local, delivery to your porch, garage, deck when you're not home!

layout.text: Secure Grocery & Package Deliveries to a Porch, Deck or Garage in a Custom Refrigerated Deck Box - 24/7

*Accessible for Deliveries 24/7
*Refrigerated/Frozen Food or Just Packages or BOTH!
*Attractive Dual Purpose Box Covers
*Resettable Combination or Wifi Locks
See more about this unique 'piracy proof' solution in our blog entries, because, back in the old days, ice and milk boxes saved time & money!
